aboutmetitlemini: Learn more about my skills and experience in Front-end development
aboutmetext: Hello! My name is Yevhenii, and I specialize in Front-end development. My experience includes working with modern technologies and frameworks such as React, Vue.js, and Angular. I always strive to create intuitive and visually appealing web interfaces that provide the best user experience.
projectstitlemini: Check out some of my latest and best projects
itschedule: Your faithful companion in organizing the educational process! Here you will find a class schedule with a list of teachers and useful tools for successful learning. Don't miss the opportunity to simplify your studies! Academic success is getting closer with IT Schedule!
breammusic: Bream-music is a modern music player featuring albums in various genres, with a bream fish as the main character. The player allows you to listen to your favorite music from any genre, create playlists, and discover new artists. Bream-music is your reliable companion in the world of music!
